data.title: Matchmaker
data.statement:
Dating is hard. Several students in a class have a crush on another student in the class, but everyone is afraid to confess their interest for fear of rejection. You decide to help everyone out by taking a survey and matching up students who have a mutual interest in each other.

Notes: 
All names and matches are in Title Case

testCases.title: Simple
testCases.testIn:
5
John Mary
Jeff Mary
Zebbie Todd
Todd Zebbie
Mary John

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read sc:string(100)
write matches
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[n]] for the number of students in the class
<<Next [[n]] lines:>> A string [[sc]] with each student in the class and their crush separated by a space. (Not all students will have a crush, in which case it will just be the student's name.)
data.outputDescription:
A list of student matches, 1 match per line, separated by a space. The name on the left should be the first student provided, and the list should be in the order provided based on the left-side name

If there are no matches, output "No Matches"

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Dating is hard. Several students in a class have a crush on another student in the class, but everyone is afraid to confess their interest for fear of rejection. You decide to help everyone out by taking a survey and matching up students who have a mutual interest in each other.

Notes:
All names and matches are in Title Case
Input
Line 1: An integer n for the number of students in the class
Next n lines: A string sc with each student in the class and their crush separated by a space. (Not all students will have a crush, in which case it will just be the student's name.)
Output
A list of student matches, 1 match per line, separated by a space. The name on the left should be the first student provided, and the list should be in the order provided based on the left-side name

If there are no matches, output "No Matches"
Constraints
2 <= n <= 100
Example
Input
5
John Mary
Jeff Mary
Zebbie Todd
Todd Zebbie
Mary John
Output
John Mary
Zebbie Todd
